examples.example: 我在那家温馨的酒店里度过了非常愉快的时光。

translate.english: I spent a very pleasant time in that warm hotel.

examples.example: 出差时我会选择舒适的酒店来确保有良好的休息环境。

translate.english: When on a business trip, I will choose a comfortable hotel to ensure a good resting environment.

examples.example: 每次旅行我都会选择干净整洁的酒店，让自己能得到很好的休息。

translate.english: Every time I travel, I will choose a clean and tidy hotel to enable myself to get a good rest.
